protein.specific_function: Has very high activity toward isobutyryl-CoA. Is an isobutyryl-CoA dehydrogenase that functions in valine catabolism. Plays a role in transcriptional coactivation within the ARC complex.

go_class.description: oxidoreductase activity, acting on the ch-ch group of donors

reference.reference_text: Telford EA, Moynihan LM, Markham AF, Lench NJ: Isolation and characterisation of a cDNA encoding the precursor for a novel member of the acyl-CoA dehydrogenase gene family. Biochim Biophys Acta. 1999 Sep 3;1446(3):371-6.
